Package net.runelite.client.plugins.itemstats.stats

Class Stat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.runelite.client.plugins.itemstats.stats.Stat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnergyStat, SkillStat
    public abstract class Stat
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract stat of a player. This includes Skills and other player variables, such as RUN_ENERGY.
    See Also:
    Stats
